newsitem.title: JAPAN: Daqing May crude oil price calculated at $18.38.
newsitem.headline: Daqing May crude oil price calculated at $18.38.

text.p: China's Daqing crude oil for May lifting to Japanese customers has been calculated at $18.38 per barrel, up 48 cents from April, traders said on Friday.
The price of Daqing crude is linked to the average of Indonesia's official prices for Minas and Cinta crudes.
Japanese buyers have accepted a Chinese offer to allocate them six million to eight million tonnes per year for the 1996 to 2000 period.
China reviews its Daqing export volume every five years.
